column1: T_Tutorial ¬ Movement is with the joystick situated left of the screen. Attack and harvesting are automatic. Use the anvil to upgrade. °
T_G_Texto ¬ Do you wish to delete your save file? °
T_Ad_Info ¬ Skipping the Ad will give half of the reward °
T_Oro ¬ Gold (to buy upgrades in the main menu) °
